name: 'Til Depth Do Us Part
description:
'Til Depth Do Us Part

...is a short boss rush through a bottomless pit guarded by unspeakably terrifying monsters. Blast your way through multiple bosses, upgrade your arsenal with their remains, and retrieve your stolen marshmallow!

The current web build shows an error after clicking Run Game, but if you click OK you should be able to play the game normally!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Left click - Fire

Right click - Alternate fire (for some weapons)


Made for Boss Rush Jam 2023 by:

MattStov -  Programming, art, concept

https://mattstov.itch.io/  

https://twitter.com/MattstovArt

Cardboard Moon - Music, SFX

https://cardboardmoon.itch.io/

https://twitter.com/cardboardmoon

How we used the theme, "makeshift":

The main mechanic and allure of 'Til Death Do Us Part is the ability for the player to arm themselves with their choice of the leftover scraps of the bosses they defeat.
